'''Master of Laws''' is an important position in the government of the [[Seven Kingdoms]]. The holder is a member of the [[King of the Andals and the First Men|monarch]]'s [[small council]], the inner cabinet of the realm. The Master of Laws is responsible for advising the king on legal matters, managing the dungeons, and supervising the [[King's Justice]].

At the start of the TV series, [[Renly Baratheon]] is Master of Laws, during the reign of his older brother, King [[Robert Baratheon]]. Renly abandons the title in order to lay claim to the [[Iron Throne]] himself following Robert's death. The post remains vacant.
